Translations.Text: (nabi ne) kaha bhi ke agar che main taumhaare paas us se bahuth behtar (maqsoodh tak pahonchaane waala) tariqa le kar aya hoon, jis par tum ne apne baap dadaao ko paaya, to unhone jawaab diya ke hum us ke munkir hai, jise de kar tumhe bheja gaya hai
pas hum ne un se inteqaam liya aur dekh le jhutlaane waalo ka kaisa anjaam hoa
aur jab ke Ibraheem(alaihissalaam) ne apne waalid se aur apni khaum se farmaaya ke main un chizo se bezaar hoon, jin ki tum ibaadath karte ho
bajuz us zaath ke jis ne mujhe paida kiya hai aur wahi mujhe hidaayath bhi karega
aur (Ibraheem(alaihissalaam)) osi ko apni aulaad mein bhi baaqi rehne waali baath qaayam kar gaye, ta ke log (shirk se) baaz aate rahe
balke main ne un logo ko aur un ke baap dadaao ko samaan (aur asbaab) diya, yahaan tak ke un ke paas haq aur saaf saaf sunaane waala rasool aa gaya
aur haq ke pahochte hee ye bol pade ke ye to jaadu hai aur hum is ke munkir hai
aur kehne lage ye Qurâ€™aan un duno bastiyo mein se kisi bade aadmi par kyo na naazil kiya gaya

kya aap ke rab ki rahmath ko ye taqseem karte hai? hum ne hee un ki zindagaani dunya ki rozi un mein taqseem ki hai aur ek ko dosre se bulandh kiya hai, ta ke ek dosre ko maa taheth karle jise ye log samet te phirte hai us se aap ke rab ki rahmath bahuth hee behtar hai
aur agar ye baath na hoti ke tamaam log ek hee tariqe par ho jayenge, to rahmaan ke saath kufr karne waalo ke gharo ki chatho ko hum chaandi ki bana dete aur zeeno ko (bhi) jin par chada karte
aur un ke gharo ke darwaaze aur taqth bhi jin par wo takya laga laga kar baithte
aur sone ke bhi aur ye sab kuch yo hee sa dunya ki zindagi ka fayda hai aur aaqirath to aap ke rab ke nazdik (sirf) parhezgaaro ke liye (hee) hai
aur jo shaqs rahmaan ki yaad se ghaflath kare, hum us par ek shaytaan muqarrar kar dete hai, wahi us ka saathi rehta hai
aur wo unhe raah se rokte hai, aur ye isi qayaal mein rehte hai ke ye hidaayath yaafta hai
yahaa tak ke jab wo hamaare paas aayega, kahega kaash mere aur tere darmiyaan mashriq aur maghrib ki doori hoti (tu) bada bura saathi hai
aur jab ke tum zaalim teher chuke to tumhe aaj hargiz tum sab ka azaab mein shareek hona koyi nafa na dega
kya pas tu behre ko suna sakta hai ya andhe ko raah dikha sakta hai aur ose jo khuli gumraahi mein ho
pas agar hum tujhe yahaa se le bhi jaaye to bhi hum un se badhla lene waale hai
ya jo kuch un se waada kiya hai wo tujhe dikha de, hum un par bhi khudrath rakhte hai
pas jo wahi aap ki taraf ki gayi hai ose mazbooth thaame rahe, beshak aap raahe raasth par hai
aur yaqinan ye (khud) aap ke liye aur aap ki khaum ke liye nasihath hai aur an-qareeb tum log puche jaoge
aur hamaare un nabiyo se pucho! jinhe hum ne aap se pehle bheja tha, ke kya hum ne sivaaye rahmaan ke aur maboodh muqarrar kiye thein jin ki ibaadath ki jaaye
aur hum ne Mosa(alaihissalaam) ko apni nishaniya de kar feraun aur us ke ham raah ke paas bheja to (Mosa (alaihissalaam) ne ja kar) kaha ke main tamaam jahaano ke rab ka rasool hoon
pas jab wo hamaari nishaaniya le kar un ke paas aaye to wo be saaqta un par hasne lage
aur hum unhe jo nishaani dikhaate thein wo dosri se badi chadi hoti thi aur hum ne unhe azaab mein pakda, ta ke wo baaz aa jaaye
aur unhone kaha aye jaadugar! hamaare liye apne rab se us ki dua kar, jis ka us ne tujh se waada kar rakha hai, yaqeen maan ke hum raah par lag jayenge
phir jab hum ne wo azaab un se hata liya, unhone osi waqt apna khaul wa qaraar tod diya
aur feraun ne apni khaum mein munaadi karaayi aur kaha aye meri khaum! kya misr ka mulk mera nahi ? aur mere (mehlo ke) niche ye nehre beh rahi hai, kya tum dekhte nahi
balke mein behtar hoon ba nisbath us ke jo be-tauqeer1 hai aur saaf bol bhi nahi sakta
accha is par sone ke kangan kyo nahi aa pade ya us ke saath paraa baandh kar farishte hee aate
us ne apni khaum ko bhaylaaya phuslaaya aur unhone osi ki maan li, yaqinan ye saare hee na farmaan log thein
phir jab unhone hamein ghussa dilaaya to hum ne un se inteqaam liya aur sab ko dubo diya
pas hum ne unhe gaya guzra kar diya aur pichlo ke liye misaal bana di
